casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Travis L. WALTERS. No. 58A02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of April 2005 by Defendant to Vacate Death Sentence:

"Motion Allowed and Remand to Trial Court by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
